title: people getting boosted
body: Riven maingold elo played with her in norms she went 3/8 agasint a vlad then i asked how she lost and the whole game starts flaming me even tho i went 3/1 early game and i didnt even feed but nope they just started flaming me. at this point i dint even know wut to say jst whatever ok. i dont even think she was in gold last season. look at her macth history just5 look at it. how can a gold elo do so badly and in norms. not even ranked in norms

replies.body: she mustve started dorans blade and felt really pressured from every vlad Q and probably just stayed under turret for the most part. or she got ganked early, she was pushed up too far when he hit 6 and probably snowballed from there, cos vlad early on doesnt have much kill pressure, even his Q isnt worthy enough of being considered pressure appliance, especially if she just got dorans shield like she should have. or she couldve gotten long sword and went ham af against him and she'd still have 3 potions or refillable charges

So... not sure how to tell you this, but people in gold can be trash without being boosted. 

This happened in norms is where you learn stuff and have fun. I have challenger friends that have a bad score when i play with them in norms coz they aren't playing a champ/role they are familiar with. 

The riven you mentioned looks like they are still trying to learn riven (you can have mastery level 5 and still be trash at a champion). Maybe they got to gold last season by playing other champions? 

On the other hand, you stated that you asked her how she lost. Thats pretty toxic dude, she was probably trying her hardest. In case you didn't realise, that is why they flamed you. Im not defending their actions, as flaming is never the answer but you really shouldn't have trash talked her.

I didnt trash talking her. i was just famring and i heard that top tower has been taken and i was already tilted as i was so i simply asked how did vlad win lane and out of the sudden the whole enemy and my team just flamed me and the riven gets a free pass. not saying the shouldve flamed the riven but i didnt even do anything wrong b4 that point was just farming like a normal jg

Ye, but still the question was passive aggressive and obv the other people thought so (bonded over the salt from previous experience with the same question) or were premade with her and jumped to her defence. 

In cases such as this, it is best just to wonder out loud instead of typing in chat

>>>> {{champion:92}} <<<< thats the problem right there, its a stereotype that Riven players are toxic ... I am sure its not true for some players ... but, Some people are just toxic and there is nothing you can do about it. It is quite likely they got lucky and somehow got placed into gold, and aren't actually that good. I was talking to a guy who got into Plat and pretty much just only played matches so they didn't decay. They don't really deserve the placement and if they actually tried to play ranked at that elo they would find they would lose a lot of games and go back into silver or bronze. It just happens sometimes and its best to just not even get hung up over it and keep having fun! :)
